songs.title: Bonecrusher
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
I'm toting a big ass, bone crusher
Excuse him, he don't know better
Now watch him, go through yo leather
Like click-clack we're on your schedule
If you knew better, you would do better
I'm getting money now, I used to shoot niggas
Who that in the cut? It's the crew nigga
Them my dogs boy don't make me let 'em loose nigga

[Verse 1: Chief Keef]
Bring my dogs out the cut with the sticks
I might just pop out the cut with ya bitch
I'm up in the club in the cut with the shits
Rolling whole pounds and I'm pouring whole bricks
I can't talk to you pussy boy you's a narc
Thinking shit was sharp hit yoyr ass with a dart
Hop up in this foreign hit your ass with the car
Thinking that you cold put this heat to your heart
I got King Kong in my blunt
I got Donkey Kong in the trunk
I got Ceaser in my backpack
Up this bitch and go grat-grat

[Hook]
I'm toting a big ass, bone crusher
Excuse him, he don't know better
Now watch him, go through yo leather
Like click-clack we're on your schedule
If you knew better, you would do better
I'm getting money now, I used to shoot niggas
Who that in the cut? It's the crew nigga
Them my dogs boy don't make me let 'em loose nigga

[Verse 2: Lil Reese]
300 them my dogs
GBE bitch that's the clique
Hop out with that choppa
Bitch you swear I'm with the shits
Niggas flexing, man they ain't on some shit
Ask that nigga, man I been fucked his bitch
If you knew better, you would do better cause' it ain't shit
Niggas tweaking, man we hit 'em in they shit
Word around town he runs his mouth just like a bitch
(What he is then?) I guess that nigga is a bitch
Bet not compare me to him man nigga ain't know shit
Same nigga, I've been with the shit
I can't switch up I know what I'm in for with the shit
Excuse all my niggas cause all they love is shooting shit

[Hook]
I'm toting big ass, bone crusher
Excuse him, he don't know better
Now watch him, go through yo leather
Like click-clack we're on your schedule
If you knew better, you would do better
I'm getting money now, I used to shoot niggas
Who that in the cut? It's the crew nigga
Them my dogs boy don't make me let 'em loose nigga

[Outro]
Bone crusher
He don't know better
Go through yo leather
If you knew better
I'm getting money know
Who that in the cut? It's the crew nigga
Them my dogs boy don't make me let 'em loose nigga
